answerText: digitigrades[10] Kangaroos are able to bounce because they have very elastic tissues of this kind. These tissues connect muscle to bone, unlike ligaments.

question: Question: Answer the following about the riveting field of terrestrial locomotion, for 10 points each. [10] Cats and dogs can both be found in this group of animals which stand and walk on their toes.
